thread.title_full: Princess Mary s family selfies on the slopes Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7

author: Sarah Carty
title: Princess Mary s family selfies on the slopes Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7
text:
Share Princess Mary s family selfies on the slopes Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7 
Princess Mary has shared adorable photos of her family hitting the slopes of the Swizz Alps. Close Princess Mary brings Lego to young children in Rio UP NEXT 
The photos, which were posted to the Danish royal family Facebook page, show 11-year-old Prince Christian, nine-year-old Princess Isabella and six-year-old twins, Princess Josephine and Prince Vincent, beaming with their parents on their family holiday. Princess Mary is pictured on the slopes with her daughter, Isabella. Photo: Instagram The princess also shared this image of her four kids beaming in the snow. Photo: Facebook 
Snapped by Princess Mary herself, one picture captured all four children together, digged out in their snow bunny gear and posing against a rock in front of their log cabin. 
The royal couple’s eldest son, Prince Christian, looked all grown up as he lent his elbow against the boulder, while his three younger siblings all hudled around him. 
Princess Mary also snapped a selfie with her lookalike daughter, Princess Isabella, with both of the royals wearing matching ski masks and jackets. Princess Isabella and Princess Josephine look flushed after their day in the snow. Photo: Facebook The six-year-old twins looked ready for a family snow day. Photo: Facebook 
The royal family were joined by Prince Frederik’s nephew, Alexander Stephens, for the trip, with Mary papping them alongside Prince Christian. 
The rare insight into the royal family’s trip continued, with Mary showing the kids were naturals on the slopes with a snap of her beloved twins holing onto their ski poles and wrapped up for a day on the slopes. 
Princess Mary also snapped a precious close-up photo of her beloved daughters with flushed cheeks from their snow day. Prince Christian and Prince Vincent play in the snow. Photo: Facebook The family were joined on their holiday by Frederik’s nephew, Alexander Stephens. Photo: Facebook. Close Princess Mary dances with young women in Burkina Faso UP NEXT VIDEO
